item.title: Test Post
item.description: Looking at Earthquake Data using R and Python Fun Fact: I visited Fiji when I was 4 and have been dying to go back ever since! I have extended family who lives there and an aunt who grew up there when she was young after moving from India. All of the pictures I have from this trip are on old film or physically printed so here's a picture of this beautiful place that I found online.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
